posts.post_title: WTB Red Hindu or Blank Back PSA/SGC Graded
posts.post_content: Please let me know what you have available. I have had all positive transactions with 15+ members on the board please ask for references if needed. Thank you so much for your time.

[quote name="ins02" post=1233041]Please let me know what you have available. I have had all positive transactions with 15+ members on the board please ask for references if needed. Thank you so much for your time.[/QUOTE]

Both will be in our next auction...along with some other toughies....

Thank you Leon!

:) how are you my friend??

[quote name="mrvster" post=1233109]:) how are you my friend??

Leon.....which bb????.....can you divulge yet??????[/QUOTE]

I am liquidating my T206 backs so I think it's Fritz.(I think you know better than I do, Johnny)....I am keeping the BL460, unless I change my mind...and also the Matty proof, Mullaney  freak and Young brown Hindu...and I think I have a Pied Matty White Cap to go with the proof.....but the rest are being sold in our next auction, minus the 3 I sold on the BST recently. I sent in a few handfuls for grading today.....
But Leon...won't that compromise your ultimate ACC goal?

I was never going to 100% complete the back set. I really only need 1 T206.  I would rather own a Joe Jackson Successful Farming than a Drum in a 2 holder.........
